@Motherhector #DnD = @Wizards_DnD
mini = miniature figurine
halfling = Bilbo or Frodo from those Lord of the Rings movies
DM = Dungeon Master, the person who runs the D&D game
campaign world = the fantasy world your adventures happen in, like Middle Earth in Lord of the Rings
